description.en:
This data contains a raw image from an advanced virtuality. Using compression and filtering techniques it has been possible to use captured data to rebuild a still of the original scenario without including noise from additional data streams.

Capsuleers can decode this vision to retrieve the original still in all its glory.

name.ja: 再構築されたマターのスペクトルビジョン
name.zh: 重建的光谱视觉玛塔尔
